mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_web_log ( user_id, role, start_time, spend_time, base_path, uri, url, method, ip, parameter, result, description, service_order_id) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{role}, #{startTime}, #{spendTime}, #{basePath}, #{uri}, #{url}, #{method}, #{ip}, #{parameter}, #{result}, #{description}, #{serviceOrderId} );
